instruction: Choose one of the following reasons:
name: James
opt_A: The test questions were straightforward, and he didn't struggle with any of them.
opt_B: He had reviewed all the material and made sure he knew each topic well.
opt_C: He was lucky that his favorite topic appeared on the exam, which helped him score higher.
opt_D: He has a natural talent for science, allowing him to understand complex concepts easily.
